details.name: Dry Time
details.info:
Touch: 30 minutes
Recoat: 1 hour
*Measured at 25°C and 50% relative humidity

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
25-30 sq. m. as primer
30-35 sq. m. as topcoat
*Depending on surface texture and porosity
* per 4-Liters at 1.7-1.4 mils DFT

details.name: Tinting
details.info: Will accept BOYSEN®® Latex Colors at a maximum level of ¼ Liter per 4-Liter can. Take note that B‑1466 Hansa Yellow and B‑1407 Toluidine Red are for interior painting only.

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: Use as supplied. If necessary, thin with not more than ½ Liter of clean water per 4-Liter can.
